data.message: my mother in law passed away , the family had still been using her faceboolk page to send messages, now she is off all out Facebook contacts , this was three months ago so the account could noy have expired , how can I find out why her account now gone ???????????????

replies.message: We're sorry to hear about your loss, Brandon. Her account may have been memorialized. Learn what happens when a deceased person's account is memorialized: https://www.facebook.com/help/www/103897939701143. -Sarah
